product.name: CoverGirl LashBlast Fusion Water Resistant Mascara
product.description:
CoverGirl LashBlast Fusion Water Resistant Mascara has a fiberstrech lengthening formula and super-volumizing brush that thickens and extends each individual lash for high volume, length and perfect
 separation rain or shine.Features:Super volumizing and buildable fiber-strength lengtheningThickens and extends the look of your bare lashesWater resistant
